text: A system has five processes P1 through PS5 and four resource types R1 through R4. There are 2 units of each resource type. Given that: e Pl holds 1 unit of R1 and requests 1 unit of R4 o P2 holds 1 unit of R3 and requests 1 unit of R2 o P3 holds one unit of R2 and requests 1 unit of R3 o P4 requests 1 unit of R4 e PS5 holds one unit of R3 and 1 unit of R2, and requests 1 unit of R3 Which one of the following statements is correct? (a) System is in unsafe state as processes P2, P3 and PS5 are deadlocked. (b) System is in unsafe state as processes P3 and PS5 are deadlocked. (c) System is in safe state with the safe sequence P1, P4, P2, P3, P5. (d) System is in safe state with the safe sequence P2, P4, P5, P3, P1.
